# pihole_ad_blocker_status (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "pihole_ad_blocker_status" "status" {
  enabled = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **enabled** (Boolean) Whether to enable the Pi-hole ad blocker

### Optional

- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
